alert.note: Alert for Antelope Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 15 at 7:11PM PST until January 16 at 3:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...South to southwest winds increasing to 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph tonight, shifting to the west by mid morning Monday. Isolated gusts to 60 mph in the foothills. The strong winds will impact portions of Highways 14 and 138. * WHERE...Antelope Valley. * WHEN...Until 3 PM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
